content.query:
TRUNCATE TABLE wwi_staging.SaleHeap;
GO

-- Replace SUFFIX with the unique suffix for your resources
COPY INTO wwi_staging.SaleHeap
FROM 'https://asadatalakea6uoi8v.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi-02/sale-small/Year=2019'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET',
    COMPRESSION = 'SNAPPY'
)
GO

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM wwi_staging.SaleHeap(nolock)
CREATE TABLE [wwi_staging].DailySalesCounts
    (
        [Date] [int]  NOT NULL,
        [NorthAmerica] [int]  NOT NULL,
        [SouthAmerica] [int]  NOT NULL,
        [Europe] [int]  NOT NULL,
        [Africa] [int]  NOT NULL,
        [Asia] [int]  NOT NULL
    )
GO

-- Replace SUFFIX with the unique suffix for your resources
COPY INTO wwi_staging.DailySalesCounts
FROM 'https://asadatalakea6uoi8v.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi-02/campaign-analytics/dailycounts.txt'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR='.',
    ROWTERMINATOR=','
)
GO;

SELECT * FROM [wwi_staging].DailySalesCounts
ORDER BY [Date] DESC
